a.text: A. A secret word for popular gift cards
a.explanation: This is not the definition of a money mule. “Money Mule” Romance Scams involve scammers asking you to move money for them.

b.text: B. Someone who transfers or moves money illegally for someone else
b.explanation: The scammer asks you to transfer money, either physically or from one account to another, claiming that you will be rewarded if you help them.

c.text: C. An investment that does well
c.explanation: This is not the definition of a money mule. “Money Mule” Romance Scams involve scammers asking you to move money for them.

d.text: D. A digital wallet for your cryptocurrency
d.explanation: This is not the definition of a money mule. “Money Mule” Romance Scams involve scammers asking you to move money for them.
